thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Wells Fargo Looks Further Under the Hood at Auto-Lending Issues

author: Emily Glazer
title: Wells Fargo Looks Further Under the Hood at Auto-Lending Issues
text:
Wells Fargo & Co. has expanded a review of auto products and services it finances as part of an effort to get ahead of heightened regulatory interest in the area, according to people familiar with the matter.
The embattled bank in recent months has been reviewing sales and potential refunds in the so-called aftermarket products that customers purchase at an auto dealership when they buy a car.
